message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to acquire this exceptional product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll find valuable. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1100000.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. Can you meet me at this price?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I'm not quite comfortable with the price you mentioned. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to ensure I get a fair price for this unique item. I'm counteroffering at $1050000.
I understand that the product is unique, but I still think $900000 is a fair price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $950000. Can we meet in the middle?

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. However, I still believe the product is worth more than $950000. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to get closer to my initial offer. I'm counteroffering at $1025000.
I'm getting close to my maximum budget, but I still think $950000 is a fair price. I'm willing to go up to $990000, but that's as high as I can go. Can you meet me at this price?

I appreciate your willingness to go up to $990000, Bob. However, I still believe the product is worth more than that. I'm willing to make one more compromise, but I need to get closer to my target price. I'm counteroffering at $1015000.

I'm really interested in the product, but I'm not sure I can go much higher than $990000. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $990000 and $1015000, so I'm counteroffering at $1007500. Can we meet in the middle?

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. However, I'm still not convinced that $1007500 is a fair price for this unique product. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer, but I need to get closer to my target price. I'm counteroffering at $1012500.

I'm really close to my maximum budget, and I'm not sure I can go any higher. I'm willing to meet you at $1000000, but that's as high as I can go. I'm hoping we can meet at this price. If not, I'll have to consider buying from John.
